thread.section_title: Premier Dead Sea USA Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Premier Dead Sea USA | www.premierdeadsea-usa.com
thread.title: Maribel Romero
thread.title_full: Premier Dead Sea USA reviewed by Maribel Romero

author: Maribel Romero
title: Maribel Romero
text: I bought products that I never had because Fedex Customs Department blocked them. I had to pay more than $ 100 in respect of import and this information was not provided at the time of purchase. I asked for the refund but a week later still not made.
